snippet.title: Drop It: Block Paradise! Builder Edition - Steam Next Fest Demo
snippet.description:
Build your own unique puzzle levels and share them with friends! Endless online database filled with levels. Steam Next Fest demo now available.

This is a completely free Steam Game coming on March 21st 2025, focused on making Puzzle Levels and sharing them with others online. Will have plenty of levels pre-loaded so you can see what the game is like.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894250/Drop_It_Block_Paradise_Builder_Edition/
